title: kaiviDaadhE dhuraiyE
sahitya:
kaiviDAdE duraiyE unnaiyanri gatiyenakkAr illaiyE



anupallavi



poyyanAgilum unpEr pughanru pughanru nidam

mei shilirttup-paNindEn ayyA unnaDimai nAn



caraNam



muTrilum ulaginai shuTri shuTri aluttEn mOha dAga shOka bhOga

sukhamum pArttEn

paTruvadini unran paTranri maTrillEn pArvati ramaNA en Arvattaik-kUrinEn
